---
title: "Checking the Cochran's test for the differences between conditions when comparing the ratios in the results"
output: html_notebook
---


```{r}

library("rstatix")
mydata = read.csv("file_to_do_cochran_qtest.csv")

mydata$main_model_on_rewritten_significance <- factor(mydata$main_model_on_rewritten_significance, levels = c(1, 0), labels = c("success", "failure"))

cochran_qtest(mydata, main_model_on_rewritten_significance ~ feature|id)

pairwise_mcnemar_test(mydata, main_model_on_rewritten_significance ~ model|id)

library(rcompanion)

Matrix.1 = as.matrix(read.table(header=TRUE, row.names=1, text="
SG       R.yes   R.no
SG.yes     13          21
SG.no     46         93
"))

mcnemar.test(Matrix.1)

cohenG(Matrix.1)


```
